kaspianIntro.message: Welcome to Kaspian. Let's get you started!

createIntro.message: Create a wallet to get started

importIntro.message: Already have a wallet? Import it here

unlockIntro.message: We're happy you're back! Please enter your password to unlock your wallet
unlockIntro.description: A warm welcome back! Unlock your magical wallet by entering the secret key to resume your enchanting journey.

password.description: Enter your secret passphrase to unlock the magical gateway to your wallet.

unlock.description: Initiate the unlocking process of your magical wallet.

send.description: A whimsical button that triggers the journey of your Kaspa coins to another enchanted wallet. Spread the magic with a simple click!

sendTitle.description: Prepare for a magical act of kindness! This is the title that graces the send screen, adding a touch of charm to your Kaspa transactions.

sendDescription.message: Enter the amount and the address to send Kaspa
sendDescription.description: Enter the amount of joy (Kaspa) and the address to send Kaspa. This step sets the stage for a wondrous transfer of magical coins.

available.description: Discover the current reservoir of Kaspa magic in your wallet. This field reveals the available balance of enchanting coins at your command.

address.description: This mystical address is like a spell-encrypted key adorned with a checksum. It has the enchanting ability to receive Kaspa coins in your magical wallet.

amount.description: In the enchanted realm of Kaspa, this field lets you specify the quantity of magic you wish to send. Enter the amount and let the joy flow!

confirmationTitle.description: A moment of confirmation before the magic unfolds! This title invites you to review the details of your Kaspa transaction, ensuring a spellbinding exchange.

confirmationDescription.message: Review the details of the transaction before signing it
confirmationDescription.description: Take a moment to gaze upon the intricacies of your Kaspa transaction before giving it the magical seal of approval. Confirm the details for a flawless spellcasting.

cancel.description: Had a change of heart? No worries! This button gracefully cancels the current enchantment, allowing the magic to wait for the perfect moment to unfold.

receive.description: Open your mystical arms to welcome Kaspa magic! This button sets the stage for the reception of enchanting coins into your wallet.

settings.description: Embark on a journey of customization and control. The settings section is your portal to tailoring your magical wallet experience to perfection.

general.description: The heart of your magical kingdom lies in the general settings. Explore and configure to keep your wallet in harmony with your mystical desires.

theme.description: Choose the hues that paint your magical realm. This setting allows you to select a theme, infusing your wallet with the colors of your enchanted dreams.

themeDescription.description: Select the theme that will adorn your wallet with a palette of magical colors. Let the hues resonate with the vibes of your mystical journey.

network.description: Navigate the ethereal network of possibilities. In the settings, choose the path that aligns with your mystical journey through the realms of Kaspa.

node.description: Connect to the heartbeat of the crypto universe. Select a node that resonates with your magical vibes, guiding your wallet through the enchanted realms.

nodeDescription.message: Select the node you will use to interact with network
nodeDescription.description: Choose the mystical node that will be your guide through the enchanted crypto realms. Your journey, your choice, as you synchronize with the magic of Kaspa.
